mapper.sql: log_id, user_id, project_id, user_name, operate_type, model_class, model_name, remark, content, create_time, is_delete
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) count,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') xtime FROM fly_operate_log WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND operate_type='INSERT' AND model_class='interface' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY xtime

SELECT
FROM fly_operate_log WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND operate_type IN ('UPDATE', 'INSERT', 'DELETE') AND is_delete = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT t.* FROM fly_operate_log t WHERE t.operate_type IN ('DELETE', 'UPDATE', 'INSERT') AND EXISTS ( SELECT t1.project_id FROM fly_user_project t1 WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId} AND t1.project_id = t.project_id AND t1.is_delete = 0 ) ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into fly_operate_log (log_id, user_id, project_id, user_name, operate_type, model_class, model_name, remark, content, create_time, is_delete) values (#{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

log_id,

mapper.update:
update fly_operate_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_class = #{modelClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fly_operate_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_class = #{modelClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
